name: Centre for European and International Policy Action
goal:
The Centre for European and International Policy Action (CEIPA) is a European and international Forum that provides governments, policy makers, the public and private sector, civil society, media and regional and international institutions with the tools and means to pursue European integration.
CEIPA focuses on issues where the European Union is in need to develop new strategies.
interests: Borders and Security, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: CEIPA follows European Directives and Regulations effecting the policy areas that are of interest. No topic of legitimate public concern, however uncomfortable, is off-limits.
